metadata.title: CVE-2021-44120 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SPIP 4.0.0 is affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability inecrire/public/interfaces.php, adding the function safehtml to thevulnerable fields. An editor is able to modify his personal information. Ifthe editor has an article written and available, when a user goes to thepublic site and wants to read the author's information, the malicious codewill be executed. The "Who are you" and "Website Name" fields arevulnerable.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
